## GradientSky interface

Interface that defines a procedural gradient sky.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface GradientSky 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [bottomColor](./harp-datasource-protocol.gradientsky.bottomcolor.md) | string | Color of bottom part of the gradient.  color-hex |
|  [groundColor](./harp-datasource-protocol.gradientsky.groundcolor.md) | string | Color of the ground plane.  color-hex |
|  [monomialPower](./harp-datasource-protocol.gradientsky.monomialpower.md) | number | Texture's gradient power. |
|  [topColor](./harp-datasource-protocol.gradientsky.topcolor.md) | string | Color of the upper part of the gradient.  color-hex |
|  [type](./harp-datasource-protocol.gradientsky.type.md) | "gradient" | Sky type. |
